mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${orderPartner} ( receive_time, return_time, pet_name, sex, age, phone, user_name, remark, user_id, partner_id, order_date, order_status, amt, varieties, partner_name, out_trade_no, trade_no, pay_type, dogFood, effective ) VALUES ( #{receiveTime}, #{returnTime}, #{petName}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{userName}, #{remark}, #{userId}, #{partnerId}, #{orderDate}, #{orderStatus}, #{amt}*0.8, #{varieties}, #{partnerName}, #{outTradeNo}, #{tradeNo}, #{payType}, #{dogFood}, '1' )

INSERT INTO ${partnerTableId} ( receive_time, return_time, pet_name, sex, age, phone, user_name, remark, user_id, user_key_id, user_table_id, partner_id, partner_name, order_date, order_status, amt, varieties, dogFood, effective ) SELECT receive_time, return_time, pet_name, sex, age, phone, user_name, remark, user_id, #{userKeyId}, #{userTableId}, #{partnerId}, partner_name, order_date, order_status, amt*0.8, varieties, dogFood, '1' FROM ${userTableId} WHERE id = #{userKeyId}
